privacy.title: Privacy Notice
privacy.heading: Project Application and Funding Service Privacy Notice
privacy.how_we_use_your_data: How we use your personal data
privacy.intro_paragraph_1: We are the Environment Agency and we run the Project Application and Funding service. We are the data controller for this service. A data controller determines how and why personal data (personal information) is processed.
privacy.intro_paragraph_2_suffix: explains how we deal with your personal information. Go to GOV.UK and search 'Environment Agency personal information charter'.
privacy.data_list_intro: The personal data we process includes:
privacy.data_cookies: Information on how you use the site, including cookies
privacy.legal_basis_paragraph: We are allowed to process your personal data to carry out a task in the public interest to manage flood risk. The lawful basis for processing your personal data is to perform a task in the public interest that is set out in law.
privacy.no_data_consequences: If you do not give us this personal data we will not be able to register you as a user on the Project Application and Funding Service.
privacy.analytics_intro: All data on this site is anonymised. Please see the following
privacy.what_we_do_with_data: What we do with your personal data
privacy.automated_decision_paragraph: We do not use your data to make an automated decision or for automated profiling.
privacy.data_sharing_paragraph: We will not share or disclose your personal data to any party outside the Environment Agency without your explicit consent unless we are lawfully able to do so.
privacy.how_long_keep_data: How long we keep your personal data
privacy.retention_paragraph: User data is reviewed every year to ensure that we do not hold on to personal information any longer than is necessary.
privacy.where_data_processed: Where your personal data is processed and stored
privacy.data_location_paragraph: We store your personal data on our servers in the UK.
privacy.dpo_responsibility: Our Data Protection Officer (DPO) is responsible for independent advice and monitoring of the Environment Agency's use of personal information.
privacy.contact_intro: If you have any concerns or queries about how we process personal data, or if you would like to make a complaint or request relating to data protection, please contact our DPO:
privacy.ico_intro: You can find out about your personal data rights from the
privacy.ico_intro_text: The ICO regulate the data protection legislation. You have the right to lodge a complaint with them at any time.
privacy.last_updated: This notice was last updated on

accessibility.title: Accessibility statement
accessibility.heading: Accessibility statement
accessibility.using_intro: The flood and coastal erosion risk management project and funding (FCERM) service is run by the Environment Agency. We want as many people as possible to be able to use this website. For example, that means you should be able to:
accessibility.using_bullet_change_contrast: change colours, contrast levels and fonts
accessibility.using_bullet_zoom: zoom in up to 200% without the text spilling off the screen
accessibility.using_bullet_keyboard: navigate most of the website using just a keyboard
accessibility.using_bullet_navigation: navigate most of the website using speech recognition software
accessibility.using_bullet_screenreader: listen to most of the website using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)
accessibility.using_we_make_changes: Weâ€™ve also made the website text as simple as possible to understand.
accessibility.using_ability_text_suffix: has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.
accessibility.how_accessible_intro: We know some parts of this website are not fully accessible:
accessibility.how_accessible_bullet1: Some field sets are missing legends. The fields are still read by the screen reader but the user needs to navigate to them. [2.4.6 Headings and Labels - Date to fix - 01.09.2023]
accessibility.how_accessible_bullet2: When an error is generated the specific error field does not have the focus. Although the tab key can used it is confusing as a screen reader doesn't know where to move to. [2.4.7 Focus Visible - Date to fix - 01.09.2023]
accessibility.how_accessible_bullet3: Browsers cannot automatically suggest information to help a user fill in a form. This would be particularly helpful when filling in a manual address. [1.3.5 Identify Input Purpose - Date to fix - 01.09.2023]
accessibility.disproportionate_burden_intro: Non-accessible content - In the service we use PDF documents that are not fully accessible to screen reader software [2018 regulations].
accessibility.cannot_access_heading: What to do if you cannot access parts of this website
accessibility.cannot_access_intro: If you need information on this website in a larger print or braille:
accessibility.reporting_problems_heading: Reporting accessibility problems with this website
accessibility.reporting_intro: We are always looking to improve the accessibility of this website. If you find any problems that are not listed on this page or think we are not meeting the requirements of the accessibility regulations, contact:
accessibility.enforcement_intro: The Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) is responsible for enforcing the accessibility regulations. If you are not happy with how we respond to your complaint.
accessibility.eass_text: contact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS)
accessibility.contacting_us_heading: Contacting us by phone or visiting us in person
accessibility.technical_info_heading: Technical information about this website's accessibility
accessibility.technical_info_intro: The Environment Agency is committed to making its website accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.
accessibility.compliance_status_intro: This service is partially compliant with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard, due to the non-compliances listed.
accessibility.compliance_bullet1: Some field sets are missing legends. The fields are still read by the screen reader but the user needs to navigate to them. [2.4.6 Headings and Labels - Date to fix - 01.09.2023]
accessibility.compliance_bullet2: When an error is generated the specific error field does not have the focus. Although the tab key can used it is confusing as a screen reader doesn't know where to move to. [2.4.7 Focus Visible - Date to fix - 01.09.2023]
accessibility.compliance_bullet3: Browsers cannot automatically suggest information to help a user fill in a form. This would be particularly helpful when filling in a manual address. [1.3.5 Identify Input Purpose - Date to fix - 01.09.2023]
accessibility.how_we_tested_intro: The service was last tested on 10th April 2023 and was checked for compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA.
accessibility.tested_by: It was tested by the FCRM development team, and the non-compliant elements will be included in the ongoing development work.

cookies.title: Cookies on Project Application and Funding Service
cookies.heading: Cookies on Project Application and Funding Service
cookies.cookies_intro: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website. We use cookies to store information about how you use the Project Application and Funding Service website.
cookies.cookie_settings_intro: We use 2 types of cookie. You can choose which cookies you're happy for us to use.
cookies.strictly_necessary_intro: These essential cookies do things like remember your progress through a form. They will always be on.
cookies.session_cookie_purpose: Allows you to log in and manage your account
cookies.preferences_cookie_purpose: Lets us know whether you've already set your cookies preferences
cookies.policy_cookie_purpose: Lets us know what your cookies preferences are
cookies.analytics_heading: Third party cookies that measure website use (analytics)
cookies.analytics_intro: We use Google Analytics to measure how you use the website so we can improve it based on user needs. We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use our site.
cookies.analytics_text: Google Analytics sets cookies that store anonymised information about:
cookies.analytics_bullet1: how you got to the site
cookies.analytics_bullet2: the pages you visit on the Project Application and Funding Service, and how long you spend on each page
cookies.analytics_bullet3: what you click on while you're visiting the site
cookies.analytics_ga_cookie_purpose: This helps us count how many people visit the service by tracking if you've visited before
cookies.analytics_gid_cookie_purpose: This helps us count how many people visit the service on this visit

cookie_settings.title: Cookie settings on Project Application and Funding Service
cookie_settings.heading: Cookie settings on Project Application and Funding Service
cookie_settings.para1: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
cookie_settings.para2: We use cookies to store information about how you use the Project Application and Funding Service website.
cookie_settings.intro_text: We use 2 types of cookie. You can choose which cookies you're happy for us to use.
cookie_settings.strictly_necessary_text: These essential cookies do things like remember your progress through a form.
cookie_settings.pafs_session_text: Allows you to log in and manage your account (expires when you close your browser)
cookie_settings.cookie_pref_text: Lets us know whether you've already set your cookies preferences (expires 1 year)
cookie_settings.cookie_policy_text: Lets us know what your cookies preferences are (expires 1 year)
cookie_settings.analytics_text: We use Google Analytics to measure how you use the website so we can improve it based on user needs. We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.
cookie_settings.analytics_sets_cookies_text: Google Analytics sets cookies that store anonymised information about:
cookie_settings.analytics_bullet1: how you got to the site
cookie_settings.analytics_bullet2: the pages you visit on the Project Application and Funding Service, and how long you spend on each page
cookie_settings.analytics_bullet3: what you click on while you're visiting the site
cookie_settings.gov_uk_help_link: Find out more about cookies on GOV.UK
cookie_settings.analytics_question: Do you want to accept analytics cookies?
cookie_settings.saved_message: Your cookie preferences have been saved.

cookie_banner.heading: Cookies on Project Application and Funding Service
cookie_banner.intro: We use some essential cookies to make this service work.
cookie_banner.analytics_intro: We'd also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.
cookie_banner.accepted_message: You've accepted analytics cookies. You can
cookie_banner.rejected_message: You've rejected analytics cookies. You can
